UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity analysis of brevinin 1E amide, an antimicrobial peptide from Rana esculenta.
Literature.Author: Kwon MY, Hong SY, Lee KH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 2592(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris ATCC 6380(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 36232(MIC=6.25µg/ml)
